message: "According to the National Human Trafficking Hotline, North Carolina ranks 10th in the country for human trafficking. In 2017, there were 221 confirmed cases. Most related to sex or labor trafficking. "We know because of our huge agricultural industry in the east that we have a lot of people that are very vulnerable to being victims of labor trafficking,"

data.description: Several people from throughout eastern North Carolina attended a Human Trafficking 101 class at Sheppard Memorial Library on Tuesday.
data.title: Several gather for human trafficking awareness
